description.description: A brief summary of what the holdout is being used for.

passPercentage.description: The percentage of custumers, on the range of 0%-10%, who won't see the new features.

gateIDs.description: An array of gatesIDs which this holdout is to be applied.

experimentIDs.description: An array of experimentsIDs which this holdout is to be applied.

layerIDs.description: An array of layersIDs which this holdout is to be applied.

isGlobal.description: Is the holdout being applied to all new gates.

value.description: UPDATED summary of what this holdout does

passingUserIDs.description: User IDs that are added will be part of the Holdout

failingUserIDs.description: User IDs that are added will be excluded from the Holdout

passingCustomIDs.description: Custom IDs that are added will be part of the Holdout. Only present if the Holdout's idType is not "userID"

failingCustomIDs.description: Custom IDs that are added will not be part of the Holdout. Only present if the Holdout's idType is not "userID"

environment.description: Which environment(s) the override is to be applied, Null implies all environments.

unitID.description: Which unit ID the override is being applied to.

passingIDs.description: IDs that are forced to be part of the Holdout

failingIDs.description: IDs that are forced to be excluded from the Holdout

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination page number (must also pass limit)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Holdouts per pagination response (must also pass page)
